jah sa was miþ Iesua þamma Nazoraiau.
MATT 26.72 jah aftra afaiaik miþ aiþa swarands þatei
ni kann þana mannan.
MATT 26.73 afar leitil þan atgaggandans þai standandans qeþun Paitrau:
bi sunjai, jah þu þize is;
jah auk razda þeina bandweiþ þuk.
MATT 26.74 þanuh dugann afdomjan jah swaran þatei
ni kann þana mannan.
jah suns hana hrukida.
MATT 26.75 jah gamunda Paitrus waurdis Iesuis qiþanis du sis: þatei
faur hanins hruk þrim sinþam afaikis mik.
jah usgaggands ut gaigrot baitraba.
MATT 27.1 At maurgin þan waurþanana, runa nemun allai gudjans jah þai sinistans manageins bi Iesu, ei afdauþidedeina ina.
MATT 27.2 jah gabindandans ina gatauhun jah anafulhun ina Pauntiau Peilatau kindina.
MATT 27.3 þanuh gasaiƕands Iudas sa galewjands ina þatei du stauai gatauhans warþ, idreigonds gawandida þans þrins tiguns silubrinaize gudjam jah sinistam MATT 27.4 qiþands:
frawaurhta mis galewjands bloþ swikn.
iþ eis qeþun:
ƕa kara unsis?
þu witeis.
MATT 27.5 jah atwairpands þaim silubreinam in alh aflaiþ, jah galeiþands ushaihah sik.
MATT 27.6 iþ þai gudjans nimandans þans skattans qeþun:
ni skuld ist lagjan þans in kaurbaunan, unte andawairþi bloþis ist.
MATT 27.7 garuni þan nimandans usbauhtedun us þaim þana akr kasjins, du usfilhan ana gastim.
MATT 27.8 duþþe haitans warþ akrs jains akrs bloþis und hina dag.
MATT 27.9 þanuh usfullnoda þata qiþano þairh Iairaimian praufetu qiþandan:
jah usnemun þrins tiguns silubreinaize andawairþi þis wairþodins, þatei garahnidedun fram sunum Israelis, MATT 27.10 jah atgebun ins und akra kasjins, swaswe anabauþ mis frauja.
MATT 27.11 iþ Iesus stoþ faura kindina,
jah frah ina sa kindins qiþands:
þu is þiudans Iudaie?
iþ Iesus qaþ du imma:
þu qiþis.
MATT 27.12 jah miþþanei wrohiþs was fram þaim gudjam jah sinistam, ni waiht andhof.
MATT 27.13 þanuh qaþ du imma Peilatus:
niu hauseis ƕan filu ana þuk weitwodjand?
MATT 27.14 jah ni andhof imma wiþra ni ainhun waurde, swaswe sildaleikida sa kindins filu.
MATT 27.15 and dulþ þan ƕarjoh biuhts was sa kindins fraletan ainana þizai managein bandjan, þanei wildedun.
MATT 27.16 habaidedunuh þan bandjan gatarhidana haitanana Barabban.
MATT 27.17 gaqumanaim þan im, qaþ im Peilatus:
ƕana wileiþ ei fraletau izwis? Barabban þau Iesu, saei haitada Xristus?
MATT 27.18 wissa auk þatei in neiþis atgebun ina.
MATT 27.19 sitandin þan imma ana stauastola, insandida du imma qens is qiþandei:
ni waiht þus jah þamma garaihtin...
...MATT 27.42 Israelis ist,
atsteigadau nu af þamma galgin jah galaubjam imma.
MATT 27.43 trauaida du guda;
lausjadau nu ina, jabai wili ina;
qaþ auk þatei
gudis im sunus.
MATT 27.44 þatuh samo jah þai waidedjans þai miþushramidans imma idweitidedun imma.
MATT 27.45 fram saihston þan ƕeilai warþ riqis ufar allai airþai und ƕeila niundon.
MATT 27.46 iþ þan bi ƕeila niundon ufhropida Iesus stibnai mikilai qiþands:
helei, helei, lima sibakþani,
þatei ist:
guþ meins, guþ meins, duƕe mis bilaist?
MATT 27.47 iþ sumai þize jainar standandane gahausjandans qeþun þatei
Helian wopeiþ sa.
MATT 27.48 jah suns þragida ains us im jah nam swamm fulljands aketis, jah lagjands ana raus draggkida ina.
MATT 27.49 iþ þai anþarai qeþun:
let, ei saiƕam, qimaiu Helias nasjan ina.
MATT 27.50 iþ Iesus aftra hropjands stibnai mikilai aflailot ahman.

MATT 27.51 jah þan faurhah alhs diskritnoda in twa, iupaþro und dalaþ, jah airþa inreiraida, jah stainos disskritnodedun, MATT 27.52 jah hlaiwasnos usluknodedun, jah managa leika þize ligandane weihaize urrisun.
